content:
SPS special forces "A" of the SBU "dismantled" the hostile infantry with thermal FPV-Drones.

About thisinformsSecurity Service of Ukraine.

As noted in the department, our warriors provided the invaders in a truly explosive mood-they all continued "After Party" already at a concert with Kobzon.

"We work further to the full victory!" - they emphasized in the SBU.

As reported by the Armyinform, Ukrainian Terrestrial Robot-KamikadzedestroyLogistics of Russians in Donetsk region.
title: Our special forces sent a hostile infantry to Amphtat to Kobzon
description: The Security Service of Ukraine informs about it. As noted in the department, our warriors ...
author: Army Inform
